backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user auth, profile storage, and poster upload/listing with access control and limited poster history.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and test IDs for poster upload, display, and image handling features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files, mainly UI pages, styles, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH-based theme tokens for light and dark modes with copper‑themed variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, React Query client, and Internet Identity provider with route definitions for all site pages.
frontend/src/components/NotFound.tsx: NotFound page component rendering a styled card with a link back to Home.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing navigation, routed content, and footer, hiding nav/footer on the intro page.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus, copper‑themed styling, and active‑route highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosterQueries.ts: Exposes queries and mutations for fetching and uploading poster blobs through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for retrieving and saving the caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom light and dark theme variables for UI colors and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BlankPage.tsx: A placeholder page component that renders nothing.
frontend/src/pages/DivisionsPage.tsx: Renders a styled page describing organizational divisions with images and themed UI components.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays multi‑section narrative lore content about Texhoma and the Copper Age using styled cards and layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page presenting a hero section and feature cards linking to major site areas like lore, history, ranks, and divisions.
frontend/src/pages/IntroPage.tsx: Landing page with a background image and a button that navigates to /home.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoPage.tsx: Displays a photo gallery section featuring T-10 power armor and accessories with styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/PosterPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/PropagandaPage.tsx: Manages user profile setup and poster uploading, including preview generation and display of latest poster.
frontend/src/pages/RanksPage.tsx: Renders detailed rank and hierarchy descriptions for the Brotherhood using styled cards and sections.
frontend/src/pages/UniformArmorVariantsB: Lists armor and uniform variants for ranks with structured card-based descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/posterImage.ts: Provides utilities to generate image URLs for poster blobs and manage local preview URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending fonts, colors, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata listing existing features, known issues, and requirements for fixing the broken image preview flow.
